mapper.select: SELECT appid, mid, '' AS pageid, cname, menupath AS path, parentid, '1' AS status FROM tb_application_menu WHERE status = '1' AND appid = #{ appid } AND parentid = #{ parentid } UNION SELECT appid, mid, pageid, cname, pagepath AS path, '', '2' AS status FROM tb_application_page WHERE status = '1' AND mid = #{ parentid } AND appid = #{ appid }

WITH RECURSIVE modt AS ( select appid,mid,parentid,cname,menupath,'1' as statuss from tb_application_menu where parentid = '000000000000000' and status = '1' and appid = #{appid} UNION ALL SELECT a.appid,a.mid,a.parentid,a.cname,a.menupath,'1' as status from tb_application_menu a join modt on a.parentid = modt.mid and a.status = '1' and a.appid = #{appid} ) select modt.* from modt
